programme.title: Haluan
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang pemandu bas Ghaffar yang dihukum penjara 10 tahun kerana bersalah atas kemalangan bas yang meragut nyawa 15 penumpang. Setelah dibebaskan Ghaffar menyesal dengan sepenuh hati dan ingin memohon maaf pada setiap penumpang yang terlibat. Dalam masa yang sama, Ghaffar berusaha untuk memperbaiki hubungan dengan keluarganya. Berita pembebasan Ghaffar juga mendapat perhatian wartawan yang inginkan penjelasan bagi kemalangan tersebut.

programme.title: Cinta Yang Pulang
programme.desc: Noah dan Adina bersahabat baik. Mereka tinggal berjiran dan belajar di kolej yang sama. Adina adalah seorang yang kelam kabut dan mudah panik. Noah sering mengejek dan membuli Adina. Di kolej Noah mempunyai seorang kekasih bernama Thia. Cemburu melihat keakraban antara Noah dan Adina, Thia telah memfitnah Adina dan menuduh dia menyebarkan gambar kurang sopan Thia.

programme.title: Saya Tunggu Awak

programme.title: Satu Hari Di Bulan Puasa
programme.desc: Iwan dan isterinya Wati, pulang ke kampung menyambut Ramadan setelah Wati kecewa kerana diberhentikan kerja. Ramlah, ibu Wati yang mengusahakan perniagaan Bahulu gembira dengan kepulangan anak dan menantunya. Ini kerana Ramlah kebetulan mencari pembantu. Ramlah menyuruh anak dan menantunya tinggal sahaja di kampung untuk membantunya. Satu hari, terjadinya kejadian yang tak diingini kepada Bahulu yang mereka hantar hingga terpaksa membuat perjanjian dengan Mamat untuk dapatkan kembali Bahulu tersebut!

programme.title: Fi

Demi mendekati Duru, Can sanggup membeli rumah bersebelahan dan menggunakan kepakarannya untuk memanipulasi kehiduan Duru yang ketika itu sedang bahagia bersama teman lelakinya, Deniz. Sementara itu, Ozge, seorang wartawan yang berani, berusaha membongkar sejarah gelap Can

programme.title: Wira Yang Tak Didendang
programme.desc: Episod kali ini menceritakan mengenai Rahmat Care di samping memberi bantuan dan pendidikan NGO ini juga menyebarkan dakwah yang pengasaasnya merupakan pemilik maahd tahfiz mandarin. Program yang akan menceritakan tentang biografi para sukarelawan yang banyak melakukan kerja-kerja kemasyarakatan. Berkorban masa dan tenaga serta menyumbangkan wang ringgit tanpa mengira kepada siapa. Setiap sukarelawan mempunyai kekuatan mereka tersendiri seperti dalam aktiviti yang mereka suka dan mungkin ada sejarah disebalik penglibatan mereka.

programme.title: Religious Clip

programme.title: Kisah Dalam Al Quran

programme.title: Tim Mama

programme.title: Hadis

programme.title: Menu Viral
programme.desc: Episod kali ini bersama Cef Naem akan berada di Gastro Hub. Cef akan merasa menu yang viral tersebut sebelum berjumpa dengan tukang masak restoran untuk melihat sendiri resipi yang digunakan.

programme.title: Adab Dalam Islam
programme.desc: Topik yang akan dibincangkan dalam episod kali ini ialah Adab Berbicara. Lidah sangat lembut dan tidak bertulang tetapi dengan kata-kata kasih sayang boleh terikat dan kebencian boleh berlaku. Bersama dengan Prof Madya Dato Dr. Izhar Ariff yang akan menghuraikan topik ini dengan lebih lanjut.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Hilang

programme.title: Selamat Datang Cinta
programme.desc: Kehilangan Ariana menggemparkan semua kakitangan resort tersebut terutama Hakim. Bagai nak rak dia telefon Ariana, berdering tapi tidak dijawab. Hanya Yasmin seorang saja yang menerima mesej dari Ariana, itupun mesej ringkas yang mengatakan dia perlu pergi dari sini, terima kasih atas segalanya, jika ada rezeki kita jumpa lagi. Namun panggilan telefon dari Yasmin pun tidak dijawab oleh Ariana.

programme.title: Menantu Tok Sintok
programme.desc: Azhan dan Badrul jadi tertekan mereka mula berubah menjadi 'jahat' semula menjadi kasar dan sudah mula meninggalkan membaca Al-quran dan berjemaah ke masjid. Mereka sudah tak bangun subuh lagi. Zara dan Milya pula melihat status whatsup mereka, sudah tidak lagi bangun jam 6 pagi Subuh, dan hanya jam 9 pagi ke atas. Zara dan Milya mengintai status facebook mereka dan melihat mereka sudha berubah daripada gambar berjubah kepada gambar ala-ala rock.

programme.title: Ustaz Kita
programme.desc: Episod ini akan membincangkan mengenai Rawatan Wajah Dalam Islam. Ustaz Kita akan membicarakan mengenai topik yang menarik mengenai isu-isu fiqh dan fatwah semasa Ustaz akan membincangkan sepanjang dalam perbincangan setiap episod perkara-perkara yang boleh mendatangkan ilmu kepada kita.

programme.title: Asbab Al Nuzul
programme.desc: Episod ini akan menerangkan surah al-Masad. Asbab Al Nuzul yang akan menjelaskan persoalan-persoalan yang menyebabkan turunnya satu-satu ayat atau beberapa ayat untuk menerangkan peristiwa dan hukumnya turunnya ayat Al- Quran. Ia berkaitan dengan beberapa ayat untuk menerangkan hal yang berhubungan dengan peristiwa tertentu atau memberikan jawapan tertentu dalam bahagian dari ilmu tafsir Qur'an.

programme.title: Kisah Dalam Al Quran
programme.desc: Dalam episod kali ini ustaz akan membawakan kisah mengenai "Kisah Nabi Ibrahim dan Namrud. Kisah yang dipaparkan oleh al-Quran adalah sebahagian daripada tanda-tanda mukjizat kerana ia menceritakan mengenai umat terdahulu yang sebahagian besar tidak diketahui.

programme.title: Umar Hatta
programme.desc: Selepas pindah dari rumah keluarga Hatta, Leyla telah terserempak dengan Johan sekali lagi. Lalu Leyla cuba tanya, apa yang Johan nak cerita kepadanya tentang Hatta sebelum ini, tapi Johan kata sudah terlambat. Malah mesej yang dia hantar kepada Leyla pun tidak dapat menghalang Leyla dari berkahwin dengan lelaki gay itu. Ini membuatkan Leyla kembali mencurigai Hatta. Lalu Leyla desak Hatta agar berterusterang dengannya. Apabila Hatta enggan berkata apa-apa, Leyla terpaksa tanya, adakah benar Hatta seorang gay? Hendak tak hendak, Hatta terpaksa menceritakan semua yang terjadi ketika dia dan Zafran sama-sama menetap di London.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Hilang
programme.desc: Setelah ketiadaan Hamidah mereke sekeluarga telah berubah dari segi agama. Mereka meneruskan hal-hal agama yang pernah dilakukan oleh Hamidah dahulu dengan berpuasa sunat, membaca al-Quran dan solat berjemaah.

programme.title: Tarbiah
programme.desc: Bariah sangat kesal dan sering membebel kerana Manisah belum dapat kerja yang lebih baik padahal Manisah ada kelulusan diploma di kolej. Dengan kelulusan itu, besar harapan Bariah pada Manisah. Manisah sering bertukar kerja gara-gara Mazlan membuat kacau di tempat kerja Manisah. Mazlan sering datang meminta duit. Manisah bercinta dengan Fadli, pemuda di kampung yang sama. Fadli sekadar mengambil kesempatan atas naifnya Manisah

programme.title: Sam: Saya Amat Mencintaimu
programme.desc: Jefri iaitu rakan sekerja Sam menyedari kehilangan Sam dan Lisa mengambil keputusan untuk mencari mereka. Sam dan Lisa pula panik apabila dia tersedar dirinya diculik dan dikunci di sebuah kilang lama kepunyaan syarikat majikannya. Pelbagai rintangan dan cabaran dilalui oleh Sam untuk menyelamatkan Lisa serta mencari jalan keluar. Persoalannya, dapatkah Jefri menjejaki kehilangan mereka? Adakah mereka terselamat? Dan yang paling penting sekali, siapakah penculik itu?

programme.title: Bro, Nampak Motor Gua?
programme.desc: Epol membeli motosikal baru menggunakan simpanannya, kemudian membawanya untuk ditunjuk-tunjuk. Malangnya, motosikal itu dicuri oleh dua pencuri. Semasa mencari motornya, Epol bertembung dengan Azura yang beg tangannya turut diragut oleh kumpulan yang sama. Dipecah dalam beg Azura ialah thumb drive yang mengandungi maklumat penting milik Tan Sri Bakhtiar, seorang ahli perniagaan ternama.

programme.title: Pembancuh Kopi Mr Vampire
programme.desc: Irsyad semakin merasai apa itu kebahagiaan sejak dia mengikat Nuzul sebagai tunangannya. Setiap hari-harinya mula terisi dengan kehadiran Nuzul dan adik-adiknya. Sesekali Irsyad akan membawa Nuzul dan adik-adiknya keluar beriadah dan akan membawa Irham bersama. Buat pertama kalinya Irsyad merasakan bagaimana mencintai seseorang dan dengan mencintai Nuzul mengajarnya untuk mencintai insan-insan dalam hidup Nuzul. Irsyad sangat teruja untuk menjadikan Nuzul miliknya yang kekal. Setiap hari dia menghitung hari untuk membahagiakan Nuzul. Rasa cintanya pada Nuzul sangat dalam dan hanya Nuzul yang kekal berada di hatinya. Akhirnya, Puan Sri Ayuni mengambil keputusan untuk menyelamatkan maruah keluarga dengan pergi bertemu dengan Nuzul. Dia meminta Nuzul meninggalkan Irsyad dengan baik. Nuzul tergamam.

programme.title: Mr Delicious

Tak lupa juga, cerita-cerita jatuh bangun disebalik setiap peniaga. Untuk episod kali ini, mereka akan pergi ke N.A Chinese Muslim Cuisine, Cinnaboy Cinnamon Rolls, Chillin & Grillin dan Kuey Kuey.

programme.desc: Nil, seorang pelajar bermasalah, memukul rakan hingga maut. Ibunya yang menyebelahi dia mengabaikan nasihat guru. Selepas dibebaskan dari Sekolah Juvana, Nil terus terlibat jenayah dan dihukum berat. Kisah ini menyorot hubungan ibu-anak yang kompleks, pengabaian ibu bapa dan akibat tindakan anak bila tiada batas disiplin.

programme.desc: Filem ini mengisahkan mengenai pengalaman sebenar buruh kasar yang ditugaskan untuk merobohkan banglo Villa Nabila.

programme.title: The Equalizer S3 EP2
programme.desc: Pasukan bantu seorang anak gadis bomba NYFD apabila bapanya hilang secara tiba-tiba. Vi dan Delilah cuba pulihkan diri selepas kejadian diculik McCall.

programme.title: The Equalizer S3 EP3
programme.desc: Seorang ibu tunggal percaya suaminya yang sudah meninggal cuba membunuhnya dari alam lain. McCall dan pasukan menyiasat dakwaan pelik ini.

programme.title: Munafik 2
programme.desc: Dihantui oleh penglihatan menakutkan, seorang penyembuh muslim mendapati imannya diuji apabila membatu seorang perempuan yang terkurung didalam pertempuran, tubuh dan jiwa dengan seorang pemimpin yang jahat.

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: Sekumpulan bekas tentera upahan bersatu semula untuk merancang rompakan epik: meningkatkan trak penuh ubat yang dipegang oleh agensi perisikan asing untuk membekalkan kem pelarian yang memerlukan. Tetapi apabila mereka mendapati trak itu benar-benar dipenuhi dengan emas yang dicuri, kumpulan saudara-saudara itu menyedari bahawa mereka telah diserang dua kali oleh salah seorang daripada mereka sendiri - dan meletakkan keadaan yang betul akan menjadi perang habis-habisan.

programme.title: The Equalizer S3 EP3
programme.desc: Seorang ibu tunggal percaya suaminya yang sudah meninggal cuba membunuhnya dari alam lain. McCall dan pasukan menyiasat dakwaan pelik ini.

programme.title: Tuyul
programme.desc: Daniel dan Mia berpindah ke rumah ibu Mia selepas ibunya meninggal dunia. Selepas membersihkan salah satu bilik, Daniel menemui sebotol yang tersembunyi secara misteri di bawah lantai kayu. Botol kosong itu mungkin merupakan rumah kepada makhluk menakutkan yang berpotensi membahayakan Daniel, Mia dan bayi mereka yang belum lahir.

programme.title: Obsesi Dia EP12
programme.desc: Ritz semakin gelisah kerana Alia masih tidak pulang ke rumah. Dalam keadaan panik dia menghubungi Zacky dan secara tidak langsung mendedahkan identiti Alia. Adam yang diserang pengikut Amir diikat dan ditahan dalam sebuah pondok bersama Alia. Pihak polis tiba namun Amir sempat lari dengan mengheret Alia bersamanya. Adam berjaya menjejaki mereka dan menyelamatkan Alia setelah Amir terbunuh dalam pertarungan. Sementara itu, Zacky lega apabila bapanya menunjukkan tanda-tanda pulih. Dalam masa yang sama dia mengesyaki Sophie merancang sesuatu yang buruk. Rafeeq pula tidak dapat mengawal perasaan setelah mengetahui Affiyah masih hidup. Dibertekad untuk membunuh Affiyah dan Ritz.

programme.title: Detik 12 Malam EP14
programme.desc: Pengantara Detik 12 Malam iaitu Saiful Azmi Jamsari dengan dibantu oleh krew-krew produksi sebagai pembantu penyiasatan berada Bukit Putus, Negeri Sembilan. Mereka akan menyusuri jalan yang sunyi disekitar kawasan berkenaan yang dikatakan menyimpan pelbagai misteri. Pengantara menemu bual Encik Angah Arin seorang penduduk tempatan, diberitahu pernah terjumpa kenderaan tanpa pemandu dan lembaga yang tinggi bermata merah. Zam Xtreme seorang Penjejak Paranormal berkongsi pengalaman, pernah terjumpa sebuah kenderaan membawa lembaga menakutkan. Pengantara bersama krew kemudiannya melakukan penyiasatan dengan berada di lokasi tersebut selepas 12 malam. Pengantara sendiri mengalami kejadian seram apabila nama dipanggil berkali-kali tanpa mengetahui dari mana dan siapa.

programme.title: lml Dnya
programme.desc: Keluarga Mermer menjalani kehidupan berganda dengan bekerja di restoran milik keluarga mereka sambil menjadi pembunuh upahan untuk sebuah organisasi antarabangsa. Selepas rahsia mereka terbongkar, keluarga yang tidak berfungsi ini perlu bekerjasama untuk terus hidup.

programme.title: Ganjil
programme.desc: Di alam mimpi, Nabila dan Mary bertemu dengan orang yang berkongsi luka mereka, diri mereka semasa kecil. Rahsia terbongkar semasa zaman kanak-kanak mereka berjalan mereka ke lorong ingatan.

programme.title: Obsesi Dia EP12
programme.desc: Ritz semakin gelisah kerana Alia masih tidak pulang ke rumah. Dalam keadaan panik dia menghubungi Zacky dan secara tidak langsung mendedahkan identiti Alia. Adam yang diserang pengikut Amir diikat dan ditahan dalam sebuah pondok bersama Alia. Pihak polis tiba namun Amir sempat lari dengan mengheret Alia bersamanya. Adam berjaya menjejaki mereka dan menyelamatkan Alia setelah Amir terbunuh dalam pertarungan. Sementara itu, Zacky lega apabila bapanya menunjukkan tanda-tanda pulih. Dalam masa yang sama dia mengesyaki Sophie merancang sesuatu yang buruk. Rafeeq pula tidak dapat mengawal perasaan setelah mengetahui Affiyah masih hidup. Dibertekad untuk membunuh Affiyah dan Ritz.

programme.title: Detik 12 Malam EP15
programme.desc: Pengantara Detik 12 Malam iaitu Saiful Azmi Jamsari dengan dibantu krew produksi melakukan penyiasatan tentang kisah misteri. Minggu ini mereka berada kem de Bana bekas tapak PLKN di Bandar Seri Jempol, Negeri Sembilan. Pengantara menemu bual bekas Pengurus Kem PLKN de Bana Dato Anuar Rashidin. Diberitahu, beliau pernah diganggu oleh lembaga menakutkan semasa bekerja dan tinggal di situ. Yuzri Mohd Yunus, penjaga kem pula pernah mengalami peristiwa menakutkan apabila pelatihnya di rasuk. Naufal seorang penjejak Paranormal, pernah Terjumpa dengan lembaga menakutkan. Pengantara bersama krew kemudiannya melakukan penyiasatan dengan berada di lokasi tersebut selepas 12 malam. Pengantara sendiri mengalami kejadian seram apabila dapat merasakan kehadiran lembaga misteri di situ.

programme.title: Sebelum Titik Noktah EP4
programme.desc: Hariz yakin Budi ada kena mengena kerana Budi ada masa dia bertengkar dengan Andy, Hariz tahu Budi adalah peminatnya, mungkin peminat ini bunuh mereka yang cuba sakiti Hariz.

programme.title: Losmen Melati EP7
programme.desc: Melati, Golok, Sigit dan Ari bersiap sedia untuk melawan Kusno. Sara memasuki losmen mencari Fadil tetapi akhirnya terperangkap di salah satu bilik. Di sana, dia mendapati Fadil terperangkap dalam perigi dari episod 4. Diserang oleh roh rumah, Sara cuba menyelamatkan Fadil dan akhirnya mengorbankan dirinya dalam proses itu. Melati meyakinkan arwah rumah untuk berpihak kepadanya dalam perjuangannya menentang Kusno. Kusno dan Pemburu menyerang Losmen Melati. Sigit berbaik semula dengan Ari atas kengerian masa lalunya dan menentang ayahnya untuk kebaikan. Kini keluar dari perigi, Fadil cuba keluar dari rumah tetapi tersedut untuk melawan Kusno. Berjuang melawan Kusno sendiri, Fadil berada di ambang kematian apabila Kusno menggigitnya, membiarkan kutukan memasuki sistemnya. Apabila semua kelihatan hilang untuk Melati, dia mendedahkan senjata rahsianya - Watih, yang Kusno dipercayai telah mati, kembali untuk memberikan pukulan maut terakhir, akhirnya mengalahkan Kusno sekali dan untuk selama-lamanya. Namun apabila hari baru menjelma, Fadil muncul semula, tetapi semuanya tidak seperti yang disangka. Mata Fadil menjadi hitam, membayangkan kisah Losmen Melati belum berakhir.

programme.title: Fly By Night
programme.desc: Seorang pemandu teksi menggunakan perkhidmatannya sebagai penyamaran untuk kegiatan pemerasan, dan apabila tingkah laku adiknya yang impulsif menarik perhatian polis dan kumpulan samseng ke ambang pintu mereka, dia sanggup melakukan apa sahaja demi melindungi orang-orang yang penting dalam hidupnya.

programme.title: Parole Examiner Lee EP1
programme.desc: Lee Han-shin memulakan tugas baharunya sebagai pemeriksa pembebasan bersyarat dan mendapati sistem itu dipengaruhi oleh kuasa serta wang. Dalam masa yang sama, detektif Ahn Seo-yoon menyiasat kes pembunuhan yang berkait dengan keluarga chaebol Ojung Group.

programme.title: Sebelum Titik Noktah EP4
programme.desc: Hariz yakin Budi ada kena mengena kerana Budi ada masa dia bertengkar dengan Andy, Hariz tahu Budi adalah peminatnya, mungkin peminat ini bunuh mereka yang cuba sakiti Hariz.

programme.title: lml Dnya
programme.desc: Keluarga Mermer menjalani kehidupan berganda dengan bekerja di restoran milik keluarga mereka sambil menjadi pembunuh upahan untuk sebuah organisasi antarabangsa. Selepas rahsia mereka terbongkar, keluarga yang tidak berfungsi ini perlu bekerjasama untuk terus hidup.

programme.title: Ceritaku Ceritamu
programme.desc: Gadis kampung yang memasang cita-cita tinggi untuk mencari pekerjaan di ibu kota. Berpengetahuan dalam bidang fesyen, dia ingin membina masa depan yang lebih cerah buatnya. Setelah berhijrah, Hasnah/Ana bertemu seorang lelaki dan menjalin hubungan bersamanya - namun dia sudah berkahwin dan mempunyai anak sebaya dengannya.

programme.title: Ribut Barat
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri, Adnan dan Azizah baru pulang ke tanah air selepas berkahwin di England. Azizah sering memandang rendah kepada keluarga suaminya yang berasal dari kampung. Adnan terlalu sayangkan isterinya sehingga sanggup melupakan ibu bapanya untuk menyenangkan hati isteri. Budaya barat yang diamalkan Adnan dan isterinya itu juga telah menyebabkan rumahtangga mereka retak menanti belah.

programme.title: Langit Petang
programme.desc: Seorang wartawan muda, Hafiz ingin membantu kekasihnya, Ruby. Ruby bergelut untuk mengatasi trauma dan pengalaman buruk dari zaman kecilnya. Hafiz sedang menulis rencana tentang kisah Pak Arif yang memiliki tanah pusaka di kampung. Hashim pula ingin membeli kesemua tanah miliknya dan menggunakan taktik jahat untuk mendapatkannya. Ternyata, Ruby adalah anak saudara kepada Pak Arif.

programme.title: Hapuslah Air Matamu
programme.desc: Kisah tentang Aini, seorang penyanyi yang berasal dari kampung yang mula menempah nama selepas menjadi artis rakaman. Bermula sebagai seorang gadis yang sopan dan berbudi pekerti dan turut disokong oleh kekasihnya, Adi sehingga Aini berjaya menjadi penyanyi idaman ramai. Tetapi, Aini mula lupa diri selepas mengecapi kejayaan. Dia kemudiannya diberi peluang berkolaborasi bersama penyanyi terkenal Indonesia, Broery. Setelah itu, Aini menjadi semakin terkenal dan dia mula ditawarkan dengan bayaran yang tinggi untuk persembahannya. Kejayaannya telah mengubah Aini menjadi angkuh dan sombong sehingga dia mula melupakan janji lama dan juga ibunya. Dihina dan dimarahi oleh Aini, ibunya pulang dengan hati yang kecewa lalu jatuh sakit. Dapatkah Aini mengubat luka itu?

programme.title: Pertentangan
programme.desc: Zainab dan Zabidi merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang dikurniakan dua orang anak lelaki. Zainab seorang isteri yang setia dan taat kepada perintah agama, namun suaminya gemar membuat maksiat. Mereka berpisah dan masing-masing mengambil seorang anak. Zabidi berkahwin dengan Farah dan menyerahkan anaknya itu kepada seorang kenalannya. Farah berlaku curang kepada Zabidi. Ketika Farah sedang keluar berfoya-foya di Singapura, Zabidi mengekorinya dan terlibat dalam satu kes pergaduhan sehingga dia dihukum penjara.

programme.title: Kad Cinta
programme.desc: Effa berhijrah ke ibu kota untuk mencari rezeki yang halal diperangkap masuk ke sindiket pelacuran yang sekelip mata mengubah hidupnya. Amri, seorang mekanik menolong Effa untuk keluar dari sindiket itu namun tragedi berlaku apabila Effa dibunuh dan Amri dijadikan suspek kepada pembunuhan itu. Amri mula mencari jalan untuk membersihkan namanya.

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Huzaimah gilakan kemewahan dan darjat sehingga sanggup meninggalkan suami dan anaknya demi mengejar kesenangan dunia. Dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi namun telah diperdaya oleh Jeff, lelaki yang dianggapnya sebagai kekasih ke kancah pelacuran. Sedar dan ingin memohon maaf ke suami dan anaknya, dia mula mencari mereka. Namun, kemaafan itu tidak tercapai kerana pintu hati yang sudah tertutup. Kemudian, satu insiden telah membuka semula pintu hati mereka untuk memaafkan Huzaimah yang sedang menghidap HIV.

programme.title: Sayang Ibu
programme.desc: Setelah kematian bapa akibat satu kebakaran, kehidupan Tiara dan ibunya menjadi semakin sulit. Mereka berdua kemudiannya menumpang tinggal di sebuah pondok. Tiara mempunyai suara yang merdu dan dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi di sebuah Syarikat rakaman. Ketika berada di kota, Tiara meminta jasa baik teman lelakinya untuk menguruskan hal ehwal ibunya di kampung. Namun, teman lelakinya itu menyalahgunakan wang yang diberikan oleh Tiara untuk ibunya.

programme.title: Jeritan Batinku
programme.desc: Fauziah, seorang anak yatim yang sering didera ibu saudaranya, Ramlah, nekad melarikan diri ke bandar. Tindakannya itu telah membawanya ke Sharif yang bertindak menjadikannya sebagai anak angkat. Namun, kehadiran Fauziah tidak disenangi Mahani. Sikap cemburu Mahani hanya membawa padah kepada dirinya. Selain itu, perasaan serba salah Ramlah menyebabkannya mengalami tekanan jiwa. Mampukah Fauziah mengecapi kebahagiaan?

programme.title: Ceritaku Ceritamu

programme.title: (DL) TVS Ringkas

programme.title: Assalamualaikum Calon Imam
programme.desc: Fisya, an energetic student suddenly caught up in a complicated fate. After losing his first love, Fisya instead engaged to Alif, her successor lecturer who was curt. But it turns out love comes in a way they didn't expect.

programme.desc: Berita Wilayah TVS membawakan berita dari negeri-negeri di seluruh negara.

programme.desc: Dokumentari Jejak Al-Quran membawa penonton mengembara ke tanah suci, menelusuri lokasi bersejarah yang berkaitan dengan wahyu dan perkembangan Islam. Kru TVS merakam kisah-kisah di sebalik tempat suci yang disebut dalam Al-Quran, mengungkap sejarah dan spiritualiti di bumi barakah.

programme.title: Tiang Kehidupan
programme.desc: Sertai figura Islamik terkemuka dalam perjalanan mendalam memahami keindahan solat sepanjang Ramadan. Melalui perbincangan bermakna, penglibatan masyarakat, dan pandangan pakar, hayati kepentingannya bersama.

programme.desc: Re Bao memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Mandarin

programme.title: The Young Master
programme.desc: Youthful martial arts master Lung is searching for his missing brother, when he is mistaken for a criminal on the run. He must prove his innocence by solving the case himself, while local lawmen and merciless mercenaries are hot on his trail.

programme.title: Wingbeats Of Borneo
programme.desc: The Wingbeats of Borneo explores the journey of 55 bird species unique to Borneo. This stunning island, spanning Sarawak and Sabah, boasts rich biodiversity and rare species, perfect for birdwatchers and photographers alike.

programme.desc: Sarawakian show that tells forgotten stories and folktales from historical times, starting from the mouth of Rejang to Iran Mountain, focusing on ethnic groups living along the rivers.

programme.title: 8x3
programme.desc: 8x3 is a 13-episode drama series featuring three 8-minute stories about ordinary people in a city, highlighting their connections through blood ties, friendships, and experiences.

programme.title: (L) TVS Pagi
programme.desc: TVS Pagi membawakan perkembangan menyeluruh dari dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Joran Borneo
programme.desc: Masih mengekalkan konsep 'Majalah' travelog, JORAN BORNEO 2 akan meneruskan ekspedisinya bagi menjejaki lubuk ikan-ikan idaman pemancing di pendalaman dan di hulu BORNEO yang bersempadan Kalimantan.

programme.title: (DL) World News
programme.desc: Delivers timely and in-depth coverage of key global events, focusing on international politics, economics, and societal changes, with a spotlight on the latest developments impacting the world today.

programme.title: The Swords Woman
programme.desc: Di era Dinasti Ming, anak perempuan seorang pegawai tinggi menjadi buruan selepas keluarganya diburu akibat politik istana. Semasa melarikan diri, dia bertemu seorang sarjana dan bersama mereka mempertahankan diri daripada musuh sambil mencari kebebasan dan keadilan. Filem ini terkenal dengan aksi pedang klasik wuxia dan adegan seni mempertahankan diri yang berpengaruh dalam sejarah filem Asia.

programme.title: Zharfa
programme.desc: Filem ini mengisahkan Zharfa, seorang gadis Malaysia yang penuh pemberontakan dan emosional, sejak ditinggalkan oleh ayah kandungnya ketika berusia satu tahun. Selepas ibunya berkahwin dengan lelaki licik, konflik antara Zharfa dan bapa tirinya semakin memuncak. Akhirnya, dia dihantar ke sebuah pesantren di pedalaman Jawa Barat, Indonesia, di mana wataknya terus berkembang dalam latar budaya dan agama yang kuat

programme.title: Sampai 7 Keturunan
programme.desc: Dalam satu peraduan cabutan bertuah, Aidil telah terpilih untuk memenangi percutian lima hari empat malam di sebuah hotel lima bintang serta wang tunai sebanyak lima ribu ringgit. Namun begitu, disebabkan isterinya Syikin yang sedang hamil, Aidil memutuskan untuk tidak mengambil percutian tersebut. Walaupun begitu, Aidil berasa sayang untuk melepaskan hadiah itu begitu sahaja. Dia memberikan wang tunai dan tiket tersebut kepada Pak Karim, yang pada mulanya keberatan untuk menerimanya kerana bimbang meninggalkan ayam kesayangannya. Setelah dipujuk berkali-kali, Pak Karim akhirnya bersetuju walaupun masih risaukan ayamnya.

programme.title: Oppa
programme.desc: Menggambarkan seorang guru yang terperangkap dalam penipuan percintaan dalam talian, mendedahkan cabaran jenayah siber di Malaysia. Usaha pihak Polis Diraja memburu penjenayah menambah elemen suspen.

programme.title: One, Two, Trivia
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang merungkai fakta-fakta menarik yang tersimpan dalam filem-filem klasik tempatan

programme.title: Kasut Ku Kusut
programme.desc: Kasut Ku Kusut mengisahkan seorang pemuda kampung bernama Manap yang berasa kecewa kerana kasut barunya telah hilang. Sementara itu, Markos, ahli kumpulan gangster Father Dragon, ditugaskan untuk membawa Suzi kepada ketua geng. Dalam perjalanan, mereka tersesat di sebuah kampung, dan Suzi berjaya melarikan diri lalu bertemu dengan Manap yang masih mencari kasutnya. Ketika Markos menemui mereka, Manap menyedari bahawa kasut yang dipakai oleh Markos kelihatan sangat mirip dengan kasutnya yang hilang.

programme.title: Ruang Temu
programme.desc: Program temu bual bersama Tony Eusoff yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi beliau berkaitan pengalaman beliau di dalam industri seni

programme.title: Hantu Tok Mudim
programme.desc: Sekumpulan lelaki muda cuba menakutkan penduduk kampung dengan cerita hantu Tok Mudim untuk mengaut keuntungan, tapi akhirnya mereka sendiri terjerat dalam situasi lucu

programme.title: Dari Hatiku ke Hatimu
programme.desc: Telefilem ini mengisahkan tentang Ayla Yanira, seorang gadis dari Pulau Langkawi yang membenci lelaki, terutama dari Kuala Lumpur, selepas mengalami putus cinta akibat jarak yang jauh. Kisah hidupnya berubah apabila Zaid Hidayat, seorang jejaka dari Kuala Lumpur, muncul dan perlahan-lahan membuka kembali pintu hati Ayla yang lama terkunci.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit (2018)
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit yang nakal sering mencuri hasil tanaman di kebun Tuan McGregor. Namun apabila cucu Tuan McGregor berpindah ke rumah tersebut, Peter dan rakan-rakannya terlibat dalam persaingan lucu untuk merebut kawalan kebun dan perhatian jiran cantik mereka, Bea.

programme.title: Melawan Takdir
programme.desc: Filem ni kisahkan perjalanan hidup Quraisy Mathar sendiri (pengarah filem ni). Ia mengangkat pengalaman hidupnya yang penuh cabaran sejak kecil kehilangan orang tersayang, jatuh bangun dalam hidup, sampai berjaya jadi seorang sineas. Cerita ni tunjuk bagaimana semangat, doa, dan keyakinan boleh buat seseorang bangkit walaupun diuji dengan pelbagai takdir yang pahit.

programme.title: Ketika Cinta Bertasbih
programme.desc: Cerita tentang Azzam, seorang pemuda yang berpegang teguh pada nilai-nilai Islam, berusaha menuntut ilmu sambil mengekalkan cinta kepada Tsuraya. Mereka menghadapi pelbagai ujian, konflik keluarga, dan rintangan sosial, namun keyakinan dan keimanan membimbing mereka menempuh cabaran cinta dan kehidupan.

programme.title: Ketika Cinta Bertasbih 2
programme.desc: Lanjutan dari Ketika Cinta Bertasbih yang mengisahkan Azzam kembali ke Indonesia selepas 9 tahun belajar di Kairo. Walaupun sudah bergelar sarjana, dia sukar cari kerja dan dipengaruhi tekanan masyarakat. Sambil menambah pengalaman berniaga, Azzam juga berdepan konflik cinta apabila wanita yang dicintainya telah dipinang sahabatnya, sementara Eliana yang menyukainya sendiri belum dapat diterimanya sebagai pilihan hati.

programme.title: Fat Buddies
programme.desc: Seorang bekas agen rahsia J yang cedera dan menjadi obes selepas misi, masih bertekad menjalankan tugas penting. Dalam perjalanannya ke Jepun untuk mendapatkan dokumen sulit, dia bertemu seorang pengawal keselamatan besar badan, Hao Yingjun. Mereka tak dijangka bekerjasama dalam satu misi komedi berbahaya melibatkan sindiket dadah, penuh aksi lucu, cabaran pelik dan situasi goofy sepanjang pengembaraan mereka.

programme.title: Istri Yang Dikorbankan Untuk Mendapatkan Suami Impian
programme.desc: Arman dan Susi baru sahaja kehilangan anak pertama mereka yang baru lahir. Susi jatuh ke dalam kemurungan yang mendalam, hingga kehilangan kewarasan. Anita datang untuk bekerja sebagai pembantu rumah tangga yang merawat Susi. Namun, tanpa pengetahuan sesiapa, Anita mula menaruh perasaan terhadap Arman.

programme.title: My Heart
programme.desc: Raisa yang patah hati selepas tunangnya, Rio, hilang tiba-tiba, pergi ke Jakarta untuk mencari jawapan. Di sana, dia bertemu Mike, seorang pelakon drama popular yang sebenarnya berperwatakan sensitif dan bermasalah, berbeza dengan wataknya di kaca TV. Perkenalan mereka secara kebetulan menjadi semakin rapat apabila mereka mula mengenali diri sebenar masing-masing. Namun, cinta mereka diuji apabila terbongkar bahawa ibu Mike, Rika, adalah isteri kedua kepada ayah Raisa, menyebabkan perebutan harta antara keluarga mereka.

programme.title: Hidayah Cinta
programme.desc: Gia dianggap pembawa malang sejak lahir dan dijodohkan dengan Aslam yang terkena kutukan Mata Jahat. Masalah demi masalah berlaku selepas perkahwinan mereka. Aslam tidak mencintai Gia kerana hatinya hanya untuk Rati, bekas tunangan yang sangat disayanginya.

programme.title: Hidayah Cinta
programme.desc: Gia dianggap pembawa malang sejak lahir dan dijodohkan dengan Aslam yang terkena kutukan Mata Jahat. Masalah demi masalah berlaku selepas perkahwinan mereka. Aslam tidak mencintai Gia kerana hatinya hanya untuk Rati, bekas tunangan yang sangat disayanginya.

programme.title: Cinta Di Ujung Sajadah
programme.desc: Rindu dan Fauzan terpaksa berdepan dengan kenyataan pahit apabila penipuan masa lalu Rindu terbongkar. Fauzan yang marah mengusir Rindu keluar dari rumah, dan Rindu berjuang untuk mendapatkan hak penjagaan anak mereka, Ayu. Dalam penyesalan, Fauzan mula menyedari bahawa cintanya terhadap Rindu masih belum padam. Namun, segalanya menjadi rumit apabila Fauzan berkahwin dengan wanita lain bernama Alia. Di sisi lain, Rindu berkenalan dengan Hafiz yang benar-benar menyayanginya.

programme.title: Ungkap Hikmah Di Balik Dosa
programme.desc: Ungkap Hikmah Di Balik Dosa adalah sebuah rancangan yang menilai kejadian atau peristiwa dari perspektif Islam, mengungkap hikmah di sebalik dosa.

programme.title: Jalan-Jalan Sultan
programme.desc: Pengacara-pengacara meneroka beberapa destinasi pelancongan terbaik di Indonesia, dan bertanya soalan kepada beberapa pengunjung. Mereka yang menjawab dengan betul akan menerima hadiah.

programme.title: Kata Ustadz Solmed
programme.desc: Kata Ustadz Solmed merupakan program bual bicara yang dibimbing oleh pengacara dan ustaz terkenal yang akan fokus membincangkan tentang masalah yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat sehinggalah masalah rumah tangga dari sudut agama.

programme.title: Istri Yang Dikorbankan Untuk Mendapatkan Suami Impian
programme.desc: Arman dan Susi baru sahaja kehilangan anak pertama mereka yang baru lahir. Susi jatuh ke dalam kemurungan yang mendalam, hingga kehilangan kewarasan. Anita datang untuk bekerja sebagai pembantu rumah tangga yang merawat Susi. Namun, tanpa pengetahuan sesiapa, Anita mula menaruh perasaan terhadap Arman.

programme.title: D'Academy 7
programme.desc: D' Academy 7 ialah musim ketujuh rancangan nyanyian popular Indonesia yang fokus pada muzik dangdut. Peserta dari seluruh negara bertanding dengan menyanyikan lagu dangdut, menunjukkan bakat vokal dan persembahan mereka. Sepanjang musim, mereka dinilai oleh juri profesional dan undian penonton. Siapakah yang akan menjuarai D'Academy musim ketujuh?

programme.title: Saleha
programme.desc: Saleha mengisahkan seorang gadis baik hati yang ditinggalkan oleh ayahnya dan dibesarkan oleh nenek. Selepas diculik dan kehilangan neneknya, dia dipersalahkan dan dihalau oleh keluarganya. Dengan semangat dan keimanan yang teguh, Saleha memulakan hidup baru di Jakarta sambil menyembunyikan penyakit serius.

programme.title: Kata Ustadz Solmed
programme.desc: Kata Ustadz Solmed merupakan program bual bicara yang dibimbing oleh pengacara dan ustaz terkenal yang akan fokus membincangkan tentang masalah yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat sehinggalah masalah rumah tangga dari sudut agama.

programme.title: Harta Warisan Pembawa Kutukan
programme.desc: Sejurus selepas pengebumian ayah mereka, Ratna mendesak agar harta pusaka dibahagikan segera. Sikap tamaknya mengundang kemarahan Fadli dan membawa Ratna ke dalam satu kutukan yang mengerikan.

programme.title: D'Academy 7
programme.desc: D' Academy 7 ialah musim ketujuh rancangan nyanyian popular Indonesia yang fokus pada muzik dangdut. programme.title: D'Academy 6
programme.desc: D'Academy Musim 6 (DA6) merupakan acara pencarian bakat menyanyi dangdut untuk musim keenam D'Academy.

programme.title: Calon Presiden
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: THE BAD GUYS: REIGN OF CHAOS
programme.desc: Oh Gu-Tak, the Chief of 'Special Crime Unit' join hands with a former gangster, a con artist and a convicted cop to solve cases. They begin to hunt for the bad guys hidden...

programme.title: WHERE WOULD YOU LIKE TO GO?
programme.desc: A schoolteacher, Do-Kyung dies as he fails to save his student Ji-Yong from drowning. His wife Myung-Ji travels to Warsaw to stay away from the reality and meets an old friend.

programme.title: HITMAN 2
programme.desc: Jun is working on a new webtoon season when he receives an email with a gripping plot. He draws it, but soon real-life terrorism mirrors the storyand Jun becomes the prime suspect.

programme.title: HONEST CANDIDATE 2
programme.desc: Joo Sang-sook, who failed to win the Seoul mayoral election by dropping the truth bomb on national television, is suddenly pulled into the spotlight again after rescuing a young man from drowning.

programme.title: CONCRETE UTOPIA
programme.desc: Seoul has laid in ruin after an earthquake, leaving one single apartment remains standing. The apartment's resident representative strives to protect residents from outsiders...

programme.title: CONFIDENTIAL ASSIGNMENT 2: INTERNATIONAL
programme.desc: N. Korea detective returns for another secret mission. Despite having different underlying motives, 3 countries join forces to bring down an international crime organization.

programme.title: SPIRITWALKER
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: PRETTY CRAZY
programme.desc: Gil-gu falls for his new neighbor, Sun-ji. She is sweet by day but appears uncanny at night. He later learns that there is a devil inside her and wants to unravel her curse.

programme.title: STEAL MY HEART
programme.desc: Hot-shot police detective Lee is out to get a hit-and-run driver and discovers the driver is his long-lost girlfriend from ten years ago. He tries to protect her before her crime record accumulates.

programme.title: THE NIGHT OWL
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely can see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: LOVE RESET
programme.desc: A couple decide to divorce after two years of marriage. They revive a 30-day divorce settlement period from the court, but then they both lost memories after a car accident...

programme.title: VICTORY
programme.desc: In 1999, Pil-sun and Mi-na team up with cheerleader Se-hyeon to form the cheerleading team 'Millennium Girls' with seven other girls for their high school soccer team, aiming for victory.

programme.title: THE ATTORNEY
programme.desc: When tax attorney Song Woo-Suk agrees to defend a student activist who was arrested and tortured into giving a false confession, his entire life and worldview begin to change drastically.

programme.title: Handsome Guys
programme.desc: The cast travels across South Korea, discovering unique culture, nature, magical places, and fascinating people. Each episode features different guests, joining in the joyful journey.

programme.title: Muscle Farmers
programme.desc: 5 'muscle farmers' land a helping hand to rural areas that face a labor shortage crisis. Join them in Korea's first agricultural-physical project as they enter the world of farming!

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: A mermaid from the Joseon period ends up in present-day Seoul, where she crosses paths with a swindler who may have ties to someone from her past.

programme.title: Cha's Family
programme.desc: From Thailand to Japan, the cast explore bold local flavors, craft their own signature spicy sauce, and bring Korea's passion for heat to a global stagemixing food, culture, and adventure into one sizzling journey.

programme.title: Cha's Family
programme.desc: From Thailand to Japan, the cast explore bold local flavors, craft their own signature spicy sauce, and bring Korea's passion for heat to a global stagemixing food, culture, and adventure into one sizzling journey.

programme.title: Seoul At Home
programme.desc: Michelin star chef Alvin Leung will show us how to make molecular Korean cuisine at home!

programme.title: You Can Cook With Sam Kim
programme.desc: Star chef Sam Kim will teach you how to make all kinds of delicious dishes - from Italian pasta, Spanish food to desserts! Follow his easy recipes and enjoy cooking!

programme.title: Handsome Guys
programme.desc: The cast travels across South Korea, discovering unique culture, nature, magical places, and fascinating people. Each episode features different guests, joining in the joyful journey.

programme.title: Dear X
programme.desc: Dear X follows Baek Ah-jin, a top actress who leverages her beauty and popularity to further her career through manipulation. She harbors a lot of grudges behind her somewhat good-natured demeanor.

programme.title: Dear X

programme.title: Muscle Farmers
programme.desc: 5 'muscle farmers' land a helping hand to rural areas that face a labor shortage crisis. Join them in Korea's first agricultural-physical project as they enter the world of farming!

programme.title: The Genius Paik 3
programme.desc: Chef Paik returns with his dream team and takes on the challenge to introduce Korean cuisine in France.

programme.title: Seoul At Home
programme.desc: Michelin star chef Alvin Leung will show us how to make molecular Korean cuisine at home!

programme.title: Dear X

programme.title: Muscle Farmers
programme.desc: 5 'muscle farmers' land a helping hand to rural areas that face a labor shortage crisis. Join them in Korea's first agricultural-physical project as they enter the world of farming!

programme.title: The Village Barber
programme.desc: Park Bo-gum, who holds a national barber's license, and his close friends Lee Sang-yi and Kwak Dong-yeon run a special barbershop in a remote rural village, tending to both hair and hearts.

programme.title: Chansung's Cooking
programme.desc: 2PM's Chansung will explore different restaurants, taste popular menus and recreate them with his own recipes!

programme.title: Golden Bowl
programme.desc: Man's Noodles is passed down to the current generation. Man Shui (Raymond Cho), Man Nin (Hugo Wong) and Man Sai (Mark Ma) have learned the craft from their father and opened their own noodle shops. However, three shops on the same street have resulted in destructive competition. Lung Kau (Mayanne Mak), Fok Siu-yuk (Ashley Chu) and Kam Chi (Kamen Kong) are their wives respectively. They often quarrel as they earnestly defend their husbands. The siblings' mother Madam Man Ji Chin-hung (Nancy Sit) has not intervened in the feud between her three sons as she is faced with a dilemma. Just before CNY's Eve, Chin-hung sees her late husband in her dream. He brings up the topic of sibling rivalry and tells Chin-hung to restore things to order. Chin-hung then uses the legend of the Mans' Golden Bowl, which was bestowed by the Emperor, as an excuse for luring her three sons into temporarily staying at their old home from first to seventh of January. Chin-hung pretends to observe her sons and their family members' behavior which she uses as a basis for deciding who is the Golden Bowl winner. In fact, she hopes to unite everybody through participation by the three families in traditional CNY activities.

programme.title: The Runner
programme.desc: Web media editor Ho Ka-yan (Elaine Yiu) encounters track and field coach Yuen Nik (Joel Chan) as she is assigned the task of approaching the Windchasers Club and digging up scandalous dirt. Because of some past regrettable incident, Yuen Nik avoids socializing with other people. But he is getting closer and closer to Ka-yan as he repeatedly mingles with her. Kwok Bui-yee (Tiffany Lau), daughter of tycoon Kwok Wong-po (Ram Chiang), eagerly joins Windchasers as she has some ulterior motive. However, Wong-po and Yuen Nik keep agitating each other as Wong-po becomes Windchasers' sponsor. Yuen Nik's buddy Lai Shun-fan (Max Cheung) asks Yuen Nik to look after his young son Mak Yu-sun. The duo gradually develop an amicable mentor-disciple relationship. And Shun-fan and Ka-yan actually had some emotional issues. Shun-fan then becomes self-destructive due to some serious illness. Yuen Nik is determined to make him pick himself up. Meanwhile, Yuen Nik takes a good look at himself as he wants to again set foot on the runway.

programme.title: STEP INTO THE PAST, A
programme.desc: HONG SHIU LUNG (KOO TIN LOK, LOUIS) is an secret agent in the 21st Century. He joins a pilot programme to fly back in time hoping that he will salvage his unforgettable love. However, something goes wrong during the mission. He is sent back to the Warring States Period. Emperor QI (LAM RAYMOND) has not been crowned yet and is kept hostage in Chiu. In order to return to the future, LUNG decides to help QI become emperor. With his wisdom and Kungfu, he is recognized and given important tasks. A modern man in the wrong era, he is bound to face difficulties. Before QI becomes emperor, LUNG is poisoned, attacked and seduced. He even gets involved in political wars. He was born a romantic man, and even though he is in a totally different time and space, he still manages to get into a love rectangle with a princess, an intellectual and a tycoon's daughter.

programme.title: Law dis-Order
programme.desc: As the founder of the leading Chinese law firm, CHEUK KAI-YIU (Lau Dan) has been re-elected as chairman of the committee for many terms. Though he promised managing partner LAU KING-CHANG (Liu Kai Chi) that he would step down, he deliberately brings in a materialistic lawyer called CHEUNG KEUNG (Alex Fong) to counterbalance KING-CHANG's obsession with power. For years, KING-CHANG has built up significant influence in the company and his associates include YAM WAI-LEUNG (Raymond Cho) and FONG NING (Mandy Wong). Thinking he could easily handle his opponent CHEUNG KEUNG's allies namely LEE SIU-WAH (Florence Kwok) and CHOW LIK-HANG (Matthew Ho), a traffic accident catches him off guard. Taking advantage of the situation, CHEUNG KEUNG gets himself a lucrative offer from KAI-YIU to become a senior partner, and even re-encounters lawyer CHEUK YI-CHUN (Ali Lee) in the process. YI-CHUN, who has a special position in the company, initially looks down on CHEUNG KEUNG but later grows fond of him. The two form a peer mentoring relationship, forcing KING-CHANG, the power-obsessed "time bomb", to finally fess up. With the descent into infighting of the whole firm, a toothless tiger that has managed to stay under the radar for years is seeking revenge......

programme.title: Happy Ever After
programme.desc: TUNG KOON (AU YEUNG CHUN WAH, BOBBY) born with a special 'King's Tongue' is betrayed by his assistant, SIU SIU (CHAN MIU YING, MARIANE) who had prepared some chili source without permission. TUNG is accused of deceiving the Emperor and is forced to flee from Guangzhou to the capital. When SIU discovered that someone had used her to trap TUNG, she sees TUNG in person and apologizes. TUNG and SIU eventually reconcile. Love feeling blossoms between them. They join together to cook a very delicious 'Marinated Lung Slice'. The Emperor, KIN LUNG (KWONG WA) loves it very much and offer TUNG to work in the palace kitchen. Since then TUNG becomes one of the Emperor's favourite officials. TUNG's good friend, MIN LEUNG (KWOK CHUN ON) gains an official title with his wife, TSUI FA (LEUNG NGAI LING, FIONA)'s support. However, LEUNG abandons FA because of the reunion with his old lover, SIN YUNG (CHEONG WAI YEE, ANGIE). In order not to ruin LEUNG's reputation, FA tolerates. Unexpectedly, YUNG accepts bribes secretly on behalf of LEUNG. YUNG's act ruins LEUNG's future.

programme.title: STEP INTO THE PAST, A
programme.desc: HONG SHIU LUNG (KOO TIN LOK, LOUIS) is an secret agent in the 21st Century. He joins a pilot programme to fly back in time hoping that he will salvage his unforgettable love. However, something goes wrong during the mission. He is sent back to the Warring States Period. Emperor QI (LAM RAYMOND) has not been crowned yet and is kept hostage in Chiu. In order to return to the future, LUNG decides to help QI become emperor. With his wisdom and Kungfu, he is recognized and given important tasks. A modern man in the wrong era, he is bound to face difficulties. Before QI becomes emperor, LUNG is poisoned, attacked and seduced. He even gets involved in political wars. He was born a romantic man, and even though he is in a totally different time and space, he still manages to get into a love rectangle with a princess, an intellectual and a tycoon's daughter.

programme.title: Law dis-Order
programme.desc: As the founder of the leading Chinese law firm, CHEUK KAI-YIU (Lau Dan) has been re-elected as chairman of the committee for many terms. Though he promised managing partner LAU KING-CHANG (Liu Kai Chi) that he would step down, he deliberately brings in a materialistic lawyer called CHEUNG KEUNG (Alex Fong) to counterbalance KING-CHANG's obsession with power. For years, KING-CHANG has built up significant influence in the company and his associates include YAM WAI-LEUNG (Raymond Cho) and FONG NING (Mandy Wong). Thinking he could easily handle his opponent CHEUNG KEUNG's allies namely LEE SIU-WAH (Florence Kwok) and CHOW LIK-HANG (Matthew Ho), a traffic accident catches him off guard. Taking advantage of the situation, CHEUNG KEUNG gets himself a lucrative offer from KAI-YIU to become a senior partner, and even re-encounters lawyer CHEUK YI-CHUN (Ali Lee) in the process. YI-CHUN, who has a special position in the company, initially looks down on CHEUNG KEUNG but later grows fond of him. The two form a peer mentoring relationship, forcing KING-CHANG, the power-obsessed "time bomb", to finally fess up. With the descent into infighting of the whole firm, a toothless tiger that has managed to stay under the radar for years is seeking revenge......

programme.title: Law dis-Order
programme.desc: As the founder of the leading Chinese law firm, CHEUK KAI-YIU (Lau Dan) has been re-elected as chairman of the committee for many terms. Though he promised managing partner LAU KING-CHANG (Liu Kai Chi) that he would step down, he deliberately brings in a materialistic lawyer called CHEUNG KEUNG (Alex Fong) to counterbalance KING-CHANG's obsession with power. The two form a peer mentoring relationship, forcing KING-CHANG, the power-obsessed "time bomb", to finally fess up. With the descent into infighting of the whole firm, a toothless tiger that has managed to stay under the radar for years is seeking revenge......

programme.title: Happy Ever After
programme.desc: TUNG KOON (AU YEUNG CHUN WAH, BOBBY) born with a special 'King's Tongue' is betrayed by his assistant, SIU SIU (CHAN MIU YING, MARIANE) who had prepared some chili source without permission. TUNG is accused of deceiving the Emperor and is forced to flee from Guangzhou to the capital. When SIU discovered that someone had used her to trap TUNG, she sees TUNG in person and apologizes. TUNG and SIU eventually reconcile. Love feeling blossoms between them. They join together to cook a very delicious 'Marinated Lung Slice'. The Emperor, KIN LUNG (KWONG WA) loves it very much and offer TUNG to work in the palace kitchen. Since then TUNG becomes one of the Emperor's favourite officials. TUNG's good friend, MIN LEUNG (KWOK CHUN ON) gains an official title with his wife, TSUI FA (LEUNG NGAI LING, FIONA)'s support. However, LEUNG abandons FA because of the reunion with his old lover, SIN YUNG (CHEONG WAI YEE, ANGIE). In order not to ruin LEUNG's reputation, FA tolerates. Unexpectedly, YUNG accepts bribes secretly on behalf of LEUNG. YUNG's act ruins LEUNG's future.

programme.title: Golden Bowl
programme.desc: Man's Noodles is passed down to the current generation. Man Shui (Raymond Cho), Man Nin (Hugo Wong) and Man Sai (Mark Ma) have learned the craft from their father and opened their own noodle shops. However, three shops on the same street have resulted in destructive competition. Lung Kau (Mayanne Mak), Fok Siu-yuk (Ashley Chu) and Kam Chi (Kamen Kong) are their wives respectively. They often quarrel as they earnestly defend their husbands. The siblings' mother Madam Man Ji Chin-hung (Nancy Sit) has not intervened in the feud between her three sons as she is faced with a dilemma. Just before CNY's Eve, Chin-hung sees her late husband in her dream. He brings up the topic of sibling rivalry and tells Chin-hung to restore things to order. Chin-hung then uses the legend of the Mans' Golden Bowl, which was bestowed by the Emperor, as an excuse for luring her three sons into temporarily staying at their old home from first to seventh of January. Chin-hung pretends to observe her sons and their family members' behavior which she uses as a basis for deciding who is the Golden Bowl winner. In fact, she hopes to unite everybody through participation by the three families in traditional CNY activities.

programme.title: The Runner
programme.desc: Web media editor Ho Ka-yan (Elaine Yiu) encounters track and field coach Yuen Nik (Joel Chan) as she is assigned the task of approaching the Windchasers Club and digging up scandalous dirt. Because of some past regrettable incident, Yuen Nik avoids socializing with other people. But he is getting closer and closer to Ka-yan as he repeatedly mingles with her. Kwok Bui-yee (Tiffany Lau), daughter of tycoon Kwok Wong-po (Ram Chiang), eagerly joins Windchasers as she has some ulterior motive. However, Wong-po and Yuen Nik keep agitating each other as Wong-po becomes Windchasers' sponsor. Yuen Nik's buddy Lai Shun-fan (Max Cheung) asks Yuen Nik to look after his young son Mak Yu-sun. The duo gradually develop an amicable mentor-disciple relationship. And Shun-fan and Ka-yan actually had some emotional issues. Shun-fan then becomes self-destructive due to some serious illness. Yuen Nik is determined to make him pick himself up. Meanwhile, Yuen Nik takes a good look at himself as he wants to again set foot on the runway.

programme.title: Good Morning Hong Kong and Global View
programme.desc: Report important news about Hong Kong, cross-strait, and international affairs.

programme.title: Who Wants A Baby?
programme.desc: An unexpected pregnancy catches couple TONG TIM-YEE (Ali Lee) and IP CHI-TING (Lai Lok Yi) off guard. They depend on their mothers for baby-sitting, but conflict ensues when the in-laws' parenting skills are poles apart. The emotionally wrought and physically challenging experience of caring for their baby girl 24/7 leaves them no other choice but to hire an experienced confinement nanny, WONG KAI-MIU (Griselda Yeung), to help them. The arrival of her newborn forces TIM-YEE to give up her fashion career; whereas CHI-TING has to say goodbye to his relaxing and enjoyable nightlife. In order to spend more time to look after her daughter, TIM-YEE changes her career to take over a post-natal care agency. With KAI-MIU pulling a few strings, TIM-YEE gets to know many expectant couples and nannies. In her role as a new mom, she is struck with a newfound appreciation, but feels like she and her husband CHI-TING are growing apart. On top of that, she even suspects that he has an affair with his coworker bartender HUI CHING (Samantha Ko). Surprisingly, CHI-TING captivates the internet after bravely saving a child in an accident, and is dubbed the greatest dad ever, which makes the agency a childcare KOL, turning things upside down

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: HUNG SHU-KAN (Lau Dan) built his own logistics business from scratch and now everything is in order. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, HUNG YUEK-SHUI (Koni Lui), is still single. She and her little prodigy sister, HUNG SUM-YUE (Andrea So), often fight over small things, putting their father in dilemmas.

programme.title: Hands Up 2026
programme.desc: The brand-new children's program Hands Up encourages kids to ask questions bravely, express themselves, and pursue their goals! Members of the mascot Sauce Family join the hosts in performing short skits, accompanying everyone for joyful moments. The show will also feature a variety of children's songs, allowing kids to sing along while learning practical life knowledge.

programme.title: 2026 Feng Shui and Fortune & What's On Today
programme.desc: 2026, the Year of the Fire Horse in the Chinese lunar calendar, is a "Red Horse" that occurs only once every sixty years, traditionally considered a year of change and challenge. "Leading the Way with Great Fortune" combines metaphysical knowledge with the festive atmosphere of the Lunar New Year, bringing positive energy to ward off misfortune and usher in a new beginning for the Red Horse Year, helping everyone achieve success! Masters Lee Shing-chak and Mak Ling-ling will provide guidance to artists from metaphysical perspectives, including annual fortune and face reading. The masters will also lead a team to the Greater Bay Area to introduce local cultural customs. In addition, other masters will share practical metaphysical tips based on their respective areas of expertise to further enhance their fortune in the Year of the Horse.

programme.title: Gourmet Express
programme.desc: Hong Kong brings together global cuisines, and its unique dishes and down-to-earth fare have captured the close attention of discerning food lovers! Food hosts and presenters such as Icy Wong,Snowy Choi,Carmen Ngai,Carmaney Wong , Jessica Liu , Gillian Ng keep up with the latest food news and deals, delving into the stories behind the flavors. Gathering firsthand information on popular eateries across various platforms, the hosts personally line up and taste the food, providing genuine reviews. Even takeout-only eateries with no dine-in option are in high demandwhat are the must-try picks? Running a food business inevitably comes with its own mix of sweet, sour, bitter, and spicy experiences. The production team follows the proprietors through their busy day, from sourcing ingredients and preparing materials to opening for business, uncovering the "stories behind the flavors."

programme.title: The Unusual Prosecutor
programme.desc: Department of Justice SADPP Pau Hey-yan (Joe Ma) possesses extreme empathy as he suffers from a rare condition called mirror-touch synesthesia. His aim is to piece together the complete truth in a case, strive to get the defendant to plead guilty, and minimize the sufferings of the victims from tedious hearings. Hey-yan teams up with law clerk Kung Suen Pak (Winki Lai), like-minded Senior Inspector Chin Hung-fei (Ricco Ng), former victim Chun Sheung-yin (Hera Chan) and trainee prosecutor Chiu Zhi-ching (Aska Cheung) to uphold justice. The chums run into obstacles. And Hey-yan has to turn hostile against his mother, who is the eldest daughter of a conglomerate, and confront his ex-lover Wong Chung-sing (Alice Chan), who is a barrister by profession. However, Hey-yan adheres to his beliefs as he is determined to uncover the truth and seek justice for the victims!

programme.title: Scoop 2026
programme.desc: "Scoop" airs from Monday to Sunday, closely following major social events and interesting stories, while also reporting the latest updates in the entertainment industry, celebrity news, as well as drama promotions and behind-the-scenes features. The "Today's Breaking News" segment keeps viewers up to date with the day's hottest stories. The in-depth feature section explores current affairs, social, and livelihood issues that the public cares about, interviewing relevant experts for their insights.

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: " Big Boys Club" is a youth talk show hosted by a group of close friendsBob Lam, Oscar Leung, Derek Wong, Philip Fan, and Alan Chan. In each episode, singers, entertainers, or guests from various fields are invited for relaxed interviews, presenting a wide range of topics including current social issues, pop culture, and trending interests. Matters of love, relationships, and even same-sex relationships are endlessly discussed topics for men and women alike. The show invites guests from diverse backgrounds to explore love and relationships, delving into the dynamics between the sexes. The "Other Dimension" segment features guests sharing extraordinary experiences, such as encounters with ghosts, UFOs, and bizarre happenings, bringing thrilling topics to the audience.

programme.title: Hands Up 2026
programme.desc: The brand-new children's program Hands Up encourages kids to ask questions bravely, express themselves, and pursue their goals! Members of the mascot Sauce Family join the hosts in performing short skits, accompanying everyone for joyful moments. The show will also feature a variety of children's songs, allowing kids to sing along while learning practical life knowledge.

programme.title: Big City Shop 2026
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to a wide range of timely topics, including seasonal products, health and wellness, fitness activities, skincare and makeup, fashion apparel, infant care, parenting knowledge, local delicacies, and pet care trends. The content is all-encompassing! In addition to hands-on demonstrations, experiences, or tests by the hosts, experts are invited to share their professional insights. In the cooking segment, several skilled culinary experts take turns showcasing simple and delicious healthy dishes and home-style recipes, helping everyone solve their cooking challenges.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: HUNG SHU-KAN (Lau Dan) built his own logistics business from scratch and now everything is in order. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, HUNG YUEK-SHUI (Koni Lui), is still single. She and her little prodigy sister, HUNG SUM-YUE (Andrea So), often fight over small things, putting their father in dilemmas.

programme.title: Yummy, Yummy? Yummy! & What's On Today
programme.desc: While filming a historical food video, Shen Yaoguang's family accidentally enters a dream world and lands in ancient Yong'an. To survive, they open a small eatery serving modern style dishes, becoming unexpectedly popular. Mistaking Prefect Lin Yan for an ancestor, they move into his residence under a fake engagement and form a deep bond. Using modern knowledge, the family adapts to ancient life and helps Lin Yan uncover the truth behind his family's injustice, exposing Prince Wu's conspiracy. Together they protect the city, and after a life or death trial, they awaken back in reality with renewed understanding of family and heritage.

programme.title: 2026 Feng Shui and Fortune
programme.desc: 2026, the Year of the Fire Horse in the Chinese lunar calendar, is a "Red Horse" that occurs only once every sixty years, traditionally considered a year of change and challenge. "Leading the Way with Great Fortune" combines metaphysical knowledge with the festive atmosphere of the Lunar New Year, bringing positive energy to ward off misfortune and usher in a new beginning for the Red Horse Year, helping everyone achieve success! The masters will also lead a team to the Greater Bay Area to introduce local cultural customs. In addition, other masters will share practical metaphysical tips based on their respective areas of expertise to further enhance their fortune in the Year of the Horse.

programme.title: Dolce Vita 2021
programme.desc: Hong Kong life is vibrant and diverse, and "Hong Kong Life, Hong Kong Enjoyment" presents both sophisticated and elegant lifestyles and down-to-earth, high-quality experiences. The program combines diverse themes, exploring different areas in each episode and inviting elites from various industries to share their secrets to success.

programme.title: Open Book
programme.desc: In this fast-food era of digitized books and chapters, where a smartphone can reveal all the world's happenings, few people still maintain the habit of reading. Patrick Sir, a well-read bibliophile, joins forces with young readers like Oscar Tao and Honey Ho to reaffirm the value of physical books. Each episode introduces a great book, opening up scientific texts, historical literature, novels, and even fashion magazines to share interesting knowledge discovered within the pages. When was the last time you thoroughly read an entire book? Take inspiration from the reading lists of top book lovers, take action, leave some breathing room in your busy life, and rekindle your reading habits to enrich yourself!

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: " Big Boys Club" is a youth talk show hosted by a group of close friendsBob Lam, Oscar Leung, Derek Wong, Philip Fan, and Alan Chan. In each episode, singers, entertainers, or guests from various fields are invited for relaxed interviews, presenting a wide range of topics including current social issues, pop culture, and trending interests. Matters of love, relationships, and even same-sex relationships are endlessly discussed topics for men and women alike. The show invites guests from diverse backgrounds to explore love and relationships, delving into the dynamics between the sexes. The "Other Dimension" segment features guests sharing extraordinary experiences, such as encounters with ghosts, UFOs, and bizarre happenings, bringing thrilling topics to the audience.

programme.title: What If
programme.desc: Xia Guo (Zhong Chuxi), a girl living in Leshan, leads a stable and peaceful life with her boyfriend Yu Jian (Liu Xueyi), happy and content, following a predictable routine. Xia Guo secretly hopes for a life that will be a little more extraordinary, but she unexpectedly gets a job opportunity in Shanghai. On one hand, there's the opportunity and challenge of city life; on the other, a predictable, ordinary life. Faced with these different choices, how will she decide?

programme.title: News At 18:30
programme.desc: Jade Channel reports important local, cross-strait, and international news every afternoon at 6:30.

programme.title: Maria's Auspicious Menu 9 & What's On Today
programme.desc: Maria's Auspicious Menu 9 & What's On Today

programme.title: Scoop 2026
programme.desc: "Scoop" airs from Monday to Sunday, closely following major social events and interesting stories, while also reporting the latest updates in the entertainment industry, celebrity news, as well as drama promotions and behind-the-scenes features. The "Today's Breaking News" segment keeps viewers up to date with the day's hottest stories. The in-depth feature section explores current affairs, social, and livelihood issues that the public cares about, interviewing relevant experts for their insights.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: HUNG SHU-KAN (Lau Dan) built his own logistics business from scratch and now everything is in order. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, HUNG YUEK-SHUI (Koni Lui), is still single. She and her little prodigy sister, HUNG SUM-YUE (Andrea So), often fight over small things, putting their father in dilemmas.

programme.title: The Unusual Prosecutor
programme.desc: Department of Justice SADPP Pau Hey-yan (Joe Ma) possesses extreme empathy as he suffers from a rare condition called mirror-touch synesthesia. His aim is to piece together the complete truth in a case, strive to get the defendant to plead guilty, and minimize the sufferings of the victims from tedious hearings. Hey-yan teams up with law clerk Kung Suen Pak (Winki Lai), like-minded Senior Inspector Chin Hung-fei (Ricco Ng), former victim Chun Sheung-yin (Hera Chan) and trainee prosecutor Chiu Zhi-ching (Aska Cheung) to uphold justice. The chums run into obstacles. And Hey-yan has to turn hostile against his mother, who is the eldest daughter of a conglomerate, and confront his ex-lover Wong Chung-sing (Alice Chan), who is a barrister by profession. However, Hey-yan adheres to his beliefs as he is determined to uncover the truth and seek justice for the victims!

programme.title: Yummy, Yummy? Yummy!
programme.desc: While filming a historical food video, Shen Yaoguang's family accidentally enters a dream world and lands in ancient Yong'an. To survive, they open a small eatery serving modern style dishes, becoming unexpectedly popular. Mistaking Prefect Lin Yan for an ancestor, they move into his residence under a fake engagement and form a deep bond. Using modern knowledge, the family adapts to ancient life and helps Lin Yan uncover the truth behind his family's injustice, exposing Prince Wu's conspiracy. Together they protect the city, and after a life or death trial, they awaken back in reality with renewed understanding of family and heritage.

programme.title: 2026 Feng Shui and Fortune
programme.desc: 2026, the Year of the Fire Horse in the Chinese lunar calendar, is a "Red Horse" that occurs only once every sixty years, traditionally considered a year of change and challenge. "Leading the Way with Great Fortune" combines metaphysical knowledge with the festive atmosphere of the Lunar New Year, bringing positive energy to ward off misfortune and usher in a new beginning for the Red Horse Year, helping everyone achieve success! Masters Lee Shing-chak and Mak Ling-ling will provide guidance to artists from metaphysical perspectives, including annual fortune and face reading. The masters will also lead a team to the Greater Bay Area to introduce local cultural customs. In addition, other masters will share practical metaphysical tips based on their respective areas of expertise to further enhance their fortune in the Year of the Horse.

programme.title: EXTRA
programme.desc: Report important news about Hong Kong, cross-strait, and international affairs. Stay updated every night with the latest news from Hong Kong's entertainment industry, as well as film and entertainment news from around the world. We report on the newest developments of artists, promotions for TV series and movies, highlights from concerts, and coverage of grand award ceremonies. We even travel abroad to cover major entertainment events, track international movie stars, and conduct exclusive interviews with well-known singers, actors, and television personalities familiar to our audienceensuring you can instantly grasp the latest happenings and news in the world of film and entertainment.

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: Reporting major news from Hong Kong, across the Taiwan Strait, and around the world, as well as sports updates, keeping you informed about important events and trends in the world of sports.

programme.title: Global View
programme.desc: " Global View," curated by seasoned journalists, guides you to view the world with a global perspectivebroadening your horizons, expanding your understanding of the news, and enriching your knowledge.

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: " Big Boys Club" is a youth talk show hosted by a group of close friendsBob Lam, Oscar Leung, Derek Wong, Philip Fan, and Alan Chan. In each episode, singers, entertainers, or guests from various fields are invited for relaxed interviews, presenting a wide range of topics including current social issues, pop culture, and trending interests. Matters of love, relationships, and even same-sex relationships are endlessly discussed topics for men and women alike. The show invites guests from diverse backgrounds to explore love and relationships, delving into the dynamics between the sexes. The "Other Dimension" segment features guests sharing extraordinary experiences, such as encounters with ghosts, UFOs, and bizarre happenings, bringing thrilling topics to the audience.

programme.title: Not Far From Here
programme.desc: Even with limited vacation time, you can still embark on a trip to explore the Greater Bay Area, thanks to "Not Far From Here"!C Kwan,Billy Luk and Karen Wu team up to uncover travel information, savoring modern Cantonese cuisine, top-notch vegetarian dishes, exquisite French food, and the delightful Omakase dessert. A sensory feast of exotic insects awaits. Immerse yourself in a jazz whiskey bar, enjoying vinyl music and stand-up comedy performances. Leisure and entertainment abound, including luxurious massage treatments, a five-star buffet, and a variety of recreational facilities. What's it like to experience a storm-themed spa? Dress up and enjoy an escape room adventure - thrilling enough! The team will also visit trendy areas and Western antique museums to find their favorite items.

programme.title: Big City Shop 2026
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to a wide range of timely topics, including seasonal products, health and wellness, fitness activities, skincare and makeup, fashion apparel, infant care, parenting knowledge, local delicacies, and pet care trends. The content is all-encompassing! In addition to hands-on demonstrations, experiences, or tests by the hosts, experts are invited to share their professional insights. In the cooking segment, several skilled culinary experts take turns showcasing simple and delicious healthy dishes and home-style recipes, helping everyone solve their cooking challenges.

programme.title: Happy Old Buddies
programme.desc: Many people may think that older adults do not have sexual needs, but surveys have shown that this is not the caseolder adults often experience less sexual activity due to various reasons. Clinical psychologist Lin Haoming from the Social Welfare Department explains the World Health Organization's definition of sexuality and offers advice for those hoping to rekindle their sex life with their partner. However, if one partner does not wish to resume sexual activity, how should both sides communicate?

programme.title: Dolce Vita 2021

programme.desc: Set in Guilin (1938-1944), this drama depicts the "Cultural War of Resistance" led by the CPC and the Eighth Route Army Office. programme.title: CNY - Blessing of Formosa
programme.desc: In this episode, the hosts travel across Taiwan during the New Year season, visiting temple communities and lively night markets in the north, central, and south. Through local traditions and everyday interactions, the programme captures the festive atmosphere and cultural charm of Taiwans temple night markets.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Taste of Life
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: Taste of Life
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef
programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Mr.Player - 11
programme.desc: To mark its anniversary, Mr Player travels to Canada for a special overseas edition. Hosts and celebrity guests team up for large-scale outdoor missions, international challenges, and Taiwanese-themed cooking battles, delivering excitement, laughter, and unforgettable moments of teamwork and adventure.
