programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: CNY - Stylish Man-The Chef - PK
programme.desc: Stylish Man-The Chef presents a feast of impressive dishes perfect for hosting guests, delivering a satisfying culinary experience. Fun game segments keep the laughter going as the hosts showcase their playful skills, adding even more enjoyment to the delicious moments. Its a lively episode filled with great food, great fun, and great company.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: CNY - Stylish Man-The Chef
programme.desc: On Little New Years Eve, the cast of Stylish Man-The Chef gathers for a festive year-end meal and playful games, kicking off a round of fun-filled challenges. Packed with laughter and lively energy, this special episode brings joyful entertainment to accompany viewers through the celebration.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Mr.Player - 11
programme.desc: To mark its anniversary, Mr Player travels to Canada for a special overseas edition. Hosts and celebrity guests team up for large-scale outdoor missions, international challenges, and Taiwanese-themed cooking battles, delivering excitement, laughter, and unforgettable moments of teamwork and adventure.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: The Lady Iron Chef
programme.desc: Beer girl and part-time model Ceci has terrible cooking skills. Coming from a well-off family that owns a big culinary business, wealthy SK meets Ceci in a gourmet competition held by his family's company. Despite their different backgrounds, Ceci and SK fall for each other. However, SK's dominating mother disapproves of their relationship. To win over her future mother-in-law, Ceci must beat her rival Jade in a gourmet showdown

programme.title: The Brotherhood of Rebel
programme.desc: Chai, a triad member, helps his childhood friend Meow flee Hong Kong after discovering that Meow attempted to kill his triad boss. 17 years later, Chai becomes a key member of the triad. When he runs into Meow one day, he knows that his gang will kill Meow if they find him. Caught between triad and brotherhood, what will Chai choose?

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jin's pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wife's death.

programme.title: We Girls
programme.desc: To afford a 200,000-yuan cochlear implant for her daughter, Gao takes a desperate risk that lands her in prison. During her time there, and after her release, she befriends three women. Despite their different personalities, they form a close bond to defy fate and support each other through hardship.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: The Vanished Murderer
programme.desc: Set in Northern China in 1932, inmate Fu Yuan escapes from prison by digging a tunnel with a silver spoon. Inspector Song Dong Lu is assigned to investigate the case. Following letters sent by Fu, Song travels to Hong City to uncover the mystery behind her disappearance, facing deeper conspiracies along the way.

programme.title: The Ex-Files 4: Marriage Plan
programme.desc: Two brothers, Meng Yun and Yu Fei, are of marriageable age and are facing challenges in love. Yun dodges family pressure to marry after his breakup, while Fei and his girlfriend opt for a marriage cooling-off period to tackle marriage issues.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well Too
programme.desc: Another super comedy directed by Clifton Ko about more farcical couplings, mistaken identities, infidelities, and arranged marriages set in the Sung Dynasty.

programme.title: Someday or One Day
programme.desc: The movie is a spin-off from the TV series of the same name. While Huang Yu Xuan mourns the death of her boyfriend, she receives a mysterious cassette player that allows her to travel back in time. She meets her boyfriend then again, but will she be able to change his destiny?

programme.title: Red Line
programme.desc: A former professional car racer, Le falls into despair after causing his brother's death in a car race, until he meets female doctor Hui and becomes an ambulance driver who vows to save lives with speed. Meanwhile, the truth about his brother's accident emerges with the investigation of Le's three good friends...

programme.title: Crypto Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigation officer Lok sets up a special team to investigate a corruption case involving a bank's top executive's use of cryptocurrency to manipulate the trading market. When the bank's chairman is kidnapped and kidnappers demand ransom in crypto coins, Lok connects the dots and vows to hunt down the mastermind behind both crimes.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: The Dragon Missile
programme.desc: Sima works for a corrupt lord Qin who is suffering from a deadly disease that only a special herb can cure. Qin sends him on an urgent mission to retrieve it, but the task is made more difficult when Sima has to fight off other martial artists who want to steal the cure away from him. He has to fight with his ultimate weapon, the Dragon Missile!

programme.title: Rendezvous With Death
programme.desc: Sun Chung had been recognized as an expert comedy and crime thriller director, but he was to gain even greater acclaim for his soulful, powerful, intelligent, and beautifully-made martial arts epics. This stands alongside The Deadly Breaking Sword and The Kung-fu Instructor as one of his very best. It's not so much the plot - a master swordsman protects a treasure chest on a dangerous journey - that makes this great, but what Sun does with it, inspiring the cast and crew to some of their finest work.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: Killers Five
programme.desc: The Duke's daughter has been kidnapped by the notorious Golden Dragon Hill bandits. A swordman named Yue Zhen Bei is assigned to save her, and expecting many dangers on the journey, Yue garners help from a group of good friends who are also kung fu masters.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Dong and Chu plan to get married but their families who are lifelong rivals, disapproved. They decide to fake suicide and eventually get both of their parents to settle their differences and approve the marriage. Concurrently, a record company announces that they will release Dong's songs, leading to double bliss for the couple.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his master's rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gao's betrayal

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: Heaven Sword And Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from Nine Yang Scriptures by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xu's until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Notorious Eight
programme.desc: The young Chen Chi-chin (Liu Yung) loses heavily to experienced gambler Hu Kuan-ten (Lo Lieh). His father loses at cards and dies of shock. Chen appeals to his uncle who summons seven fellow professional gamblers to carry out vengeance. Much more than a gambling film, this is a thrilling melting pot of martial arts stars, extortion, illicit love, poker-face vengeance, and all sorts of edge-of-your-seat gambling duels. Featuring two of the leading action stars of the era, Chen Kuen-tai and Lo Lieh, in a series of intense poker game standoffs. Famed director of the genre, Wong Jing, also has a guest appearance as one of the Notorious Eight.

programme.title: Pursuit Of Vengeance
programme.desc: Kung Fu legend Ti Lung stars in the action movie as Fu Xue Hong, embarking on a epic journey of revenge for his father.

programme.title: Portrait In Crystal
programme.desc: Tragic deaths in the underworld cause leader "Yama" (Teng Wei-hao) to suspect a portrait in crystal with mysterious powers. He sends Hen Pan (Chen Hung) and Pai Pan (Hung Hsin-nan) to interrogate its creator, martial artist Lung Fei (Pai Piao)...

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Cat vs Rat
programme.desc: Zhan and Bai are equally matched in martial arts skills. Bai saves the Emperor one day but did not believe in his identity and rejects a promotion. When Zhan is promoted to the royal guard after saving the Emperor, Bai gets angry and tries to prank him by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Zhan is able to retrieve the seal with his skills.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Oh My Lallan
programme.desc: Lallan-a stray dog who lives around a house with 4 other Pets & sneaks into the house for food, water & shelter.The 4 pets' sole mission is to keep this stray dog away from them and the family

programme.desc: Manimaran is forced to protect Malli, the henchman hired to kill him. In doing so, he clashes with Ashok Mithran, a corrupt lawyer.

programme.title: Bayama Irukku
programme.desc: A man rescues four friends and gives them shelter in his home. However, they soon realise that the man's wife is actually a ghost and decide to help him.

programme.title: Aacharya
programme.desc: A former Naxalite becomes a social reformer, confronting the Endowments Department to combat the misappropriation of temple funds and donations.

programme.title: Rathnam

programme.title: China's Wild Guangdong

programme.title: China's Wild Guangdong

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal
programme.desc: Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons
programme.desc: Once superabundant, African Elephant populations have declined drastically due to hunting. Get an in-depth look into the lives of the most powerful land mammals on the planet, and see what parks like Addo and Tembe are doing to preserve their future.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters
programme.desc: Trace dazzling waterways all over the world, from volcanic rivers in Russia's far east to geothermal streams in Florida. Watch as beavers transform entire landscapes with their well-engineered dams, then enjoy a winter spa day with manatees.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters
programme.desc: Journey through mystical lakes, where life adapts, survives, and transforms. Witness the power of ancient beasts like the snapping turtle, watch a dragonfly metamorphosis, and walk tall with flamingoes as they brave burning, corrosive waters.

programme.title: Uptown Otters
programme.desc: Chase Anna to the Townies' lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies' first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a park's main attraction.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild
programme.desc: Feel the enchantment of Brazil's Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Huzzah! Gabby the Bold and Pandy the Purr-owd are Knights in Training, and they head into the dollhouse for the Royal Knighting Ceremony. But it turns out that someone's locked King Catnip in the tower and without him they'll have to cancel the Royal Knighting Ceremony! It's up to the Knights in Training to solve the mystery and save King Catnip by performing acts of knighthood. For our Cat of the Day, Pandy makes a shield craft!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Lured into an empty hotel where a baby has supposedly gone missing, the team is trapped by Crispin Biscuits, a chaotic British schoolboy baby who's been hired to wreck Boss and Tina's lives. Crispin puts the new company's loyalty to a test in a series of fiendish puzzling mind games, all with the threat of constant balloon popping (horrible for baby ears!)

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Our team's startup company and their rivals at Baby Corp get in a Space Race, competing to see who can make the cutest kiddie-pretend moon landing for a baby - a spectacle sure to bring in a bounty of Baby Love. With both companies pouring their resources into a simulated space take off, tempers and sabotage are running hot, and the scrappy little startup is in danger of getting crushed by their big business competitor.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R & D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling Adult Babies before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Cleve Kelso breaks Rafaela Moreno and a dangerous, cybernetic prisoner named Matsuo Mori from a high-security ice prison. Back in LA, Tony and the crew experience a major shake-up when Echo gets accepted to Ms. Nowhere's spy training but Tony is rejected. While Tony is grappling with his identity crisis, Echo struggles to survive spy school, and Ms. Nowhere and Gary disappear in a massive North African storm during their hunt for Cleve. Echo must lead the Toretto crew and finish Ms. Nowhere's mission - what could Cleve be up to in the desert?

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: The team travels to Nihaya, or The Dead End, in their pursuit of Nowhere's mission. Unfortunately they run into some of Layla's spurned former criminal partner Sandocal, who steals the kids' cars for revenge on Layla. programme.title: Fadhilat Ramadan
programme.desc: Fadilat Ramadan ialah keistimewaan yang Allah SWT kurniakan dalam bulan yang mulia ini, di mana pahala amalan dilipatgandakan dan dosa diampunkan bagi mereka yang berpuasa dengan ikhlas. Ramadan juga bulan turunnya al-Quran dan mengandungi Lailatul Qadar yang lebih baik daripada seribu bulan. Bulan ini penuh rahmat, keberkatan dan peluang untuk mendekatkan diri kepada Allah SWT.

programme.title: kapsul Indahnya Ramadan
programme.desc: Indahnya Ramadan ialah keistimewaan dan kelebihan bulan Ramadan yang membawa suasana penuh ketenangan, keberkatan dan rahmat. Pada bulan ini, umat Islam berpeluang memperbanyakkan ibadah, mendekatkan diri kepada Allah, serta merasai keindahan kebersamaan melalui puasa, solat tarawih dan amalan bersedekah. Ramadan menjadikan hati lebih bersih, sabar dan bersyukur.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's going on this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Kathryn Robinson.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Summer: Blueberry Bounty & Hydrangea Haven
programme.desc: Costa visits an historic homestead where locals have turned a vacant vegie garden into a beautiful community hub. A family-run blueberry farm using regenerative practices, plus an easy, cost-effective way to grow ferns.

programme.title: On Country Kitchen
programme.desc: Derek starts his journey on the hunt for some duck, to help make an olive tapenade, head out on sea to collect ocean grown farmed abalone and even finds time to shake a leg with a local Noongar kids' dance group.

programme.title: Palisa Anderson's Water Heart Food - Humble Origins
programme.desc: Palisa Anderson explores her passion for cooking with fresh, seasonal and local produce; she catches up with food author Christine Manfield and the renowned Peter Gilmore of Sydney's Quay Restaurant.

programme.title: Palisa Anderson's Water Heart Food - Third Culture Cooks
programme.desc: Palisa Anderson heads to Sydney's Thai Town to meet up with two old friends, Ari Walpole and Mahalia Barnes, who share similar experiences to her of growing up as second-generation Australians in Thai families.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani Gray and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: Roads Unknown India
programme.desc: Jess and the team arrive in Mumbai, soaking in the city's vibrant culture. Split up along the way, they reunite in Jaisalmer where they experience quintessential Rajasthan riding across the iconic dunes of the Thar Desert.

programme.title: Common Cause - Island of Wisdom - Solomon Islands
programme.desc: Overwhelmed by outside forces, the Solomon Island Rangers Association visits the Torres Strait in Australia to learn how traditional knowledge and western science are being harnessed to protect culture and the environment.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Summer: Blueberry Bounty & Hydrangea Haven

programme.title: Boyer Lecture Series - John Anderson - Our Civilisational Moment
programme.desc: John Anderson, AC, farmer, grazier and former deputy prime minister, whose talk, 'Our Civilisational Moment' argues that Australia lacks the spirit, not the machinery of democracy.

programme.desc: An annual lecture celebrating the life and work of a prominent Chinese Australian.
